introduction.title: Final Year Computer Engineering Student at NTU.
introduction.text: I'm passionate about building software that solves real-world problems, and I'm always looking for opportunities to learn and grow.

main-page-cards.title: Experiences
main-page-cards.description: Here some of my projects and experiences

content-body: Develop and maintain frontend codebase for various projects using React, Typescript, Ant Design and ECharts
Work with UI and backend team to integrate new features and functionalities
Create Software Requirements Specifications (SRS) for various projects
Use CI/CD Pipelines like Jenkins to automate deployment process
Develop frontend client of chatbot using React and Typescript
Implement backend server using Node.js and ExpressJS with RESTful APIs
Integrate chatbot with AI Python server using PyTorch and Hugging Face Transformers
Develop controls for STM32 Microcontroller to interface with sensors and motors
Implement PID control algorithms for motor speed and steering angle control
Integrate controls with Raspberry Pi for autonomous navigation
Develop Computer Vision algorithms for lane detection and obstacle avoidance
Graduated with First Class Honours in Computer Engineering with GPA of 4.66
Awarded ASEAN Scholarship to join NTU
Dean's List for Academic Year 2021 and 2023
